General

Q: How often is this app\'s data updated?
A: If you are connected to the internet, this app pulls all data from the Yugioh Wikia in real time, so the data is always up-to-date.

If you are offline, this app uses an offline database, which is updated about once a month.

Q: If the app\'s information is always up-to-date, why don\'t the latest changes in the Wikia show up in the app?
A: This app does some caching for performance reason, so you can force close and restart it to force it to load the latest data.

Q: I like this app!
A: I\'m glad to hear it. Please rate it on the Play Store :)

Also if you don\'t like the ads, you may consider getting the ads-free version on the Play store (its name is \"YGO Database Pro\").

Q: This app sucks!/I found a bug/This is not useful/I have a suggestion...
A: Please drop me a line at chinho.dev@gmail.com and let me know how I can improve it. Thank you :)
